Detailed Description

DrmRightsObjectStore is the persistent storage area for DrmRightsObjects. Applications can retrieve DrmRightsObjectContainer objects to query constraints on assets. DrmRightsObjectStore is a singleton that will read rights objects at power on to memory and updates FFS database accordingly whenever a rights object status has been changed.
